### `drop()` {#fn-drop}

函数原型：`fn drop()`

函数说明：丢弃整条日志，不进行上传

```python
# in << {"str_a": "2", "str_b": "3"}
json(_, str_a)
if str_a == "2"{
  drop()
  exit()
}
json(_, str_b)

# Extracted data(drop: true, cost: 30.02µs):
# {
#   "message": "{\"str_a\": \"2\", \"str_b\": \"3\"}",
#   "str_a": "2"
# }
```
